value.string:
"""
 This script generates a sections list to filter the document on UNG Docs.
 XXX - The generation of domains should be more dynamic because some domains is create manually.
 """
 
 def appendTempDomain(id, title, property_dict):
 domain = parent.generateTempDomain(id=id)
 domain.edit(title=title,
 domain_generator_method_id = script.id)
 domain.setCriterionPropertyList(property_dict.keys())
 for key, value in property_dict.items():
 domain.setCriterion(key, value)
 domain_list.append(domain)
 
 domain_list = []
 
 if depth == 1:
 return domain_list
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('all_document_list', 
 'All Documents', 
 dict(validation_state=['draft']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('hidden_document_list', 
 'Hidden', 
 dict(validation_state=['hidden']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('opened_document_list', 
 'Opened by me', 
 dict(local_roles='Owner', validation_state=['draft']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('owner_document_list', 
 'Owned by me',
 dict(local_roles='Owner', validation_state=['draft']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('shared_document_list', 
 'Shared by me',
 dict(validation_state=['draft']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('starred_document_list',
 'Starred',
 dict(validation_state=['draft']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('trash_document_list',
 'Trash',
 dict(validation_state=['deleted']))
 
 domain = parent.generateTempDomain(id='webpage_module_list')
 domain.edit(title='Document by Type',
 list_method='WebPageModule_getDocumentListFiltered',
 domain_generator_method_id = script.id)
 domain_list.append(domain)
 
 # XXX - Review code to be more dynamic
 webpage_subdomain = domain.generateTempDomain(id='subWebPage')
 webpage_subdomain.edit(title="Web Page",
 membership_criterion_base_category = ("webpage_module_list"),
 membership_criterion_category = ("webpage_module_list"),
 list_method='WebPageModule_getWebPageListFiltered',
 domain_generator_method_id=script.id)
 
 webtable_subdomain = domain.generateTempDomain(id='subWebTable')
 webtable_subdomain.edit(title="Web Table",
 membership_criterion_base_category = ("webpage_module_list"),
 membership_criterion_category = ("webpage_module_list"),
 list_method='WebPageModule_getWebTableListFiltered',
 domain_generator_method_id=script.id)
 
 webillustration_subdomain = domain.generateTempDomain(id='subWebIllustraion')
 webillustration_subdomain.edit(title="Web Illustration",
 membership_criterion_base_category = ("webpage_module_list"),
 membership_criterion_category = ("webpage_module_list"),
 list_method='WebPageModule_getWebIllustrationListFiltered',
 domain_generator_method_id=script.id)
 
 return domain_list
